content:
Diagnosis:
Cervical cancer Stage IIA2, diagnosed March 2024
PD-L1 negative

Treatment:
External beam radiotherapy completed 15 April 2024
Brachytherapy completed 30 April 2024
Weekly cisplatin completed - total 5 cycles

Current situation:
First follow-up post completion of chemoradiotherapy

Symptoms:
Mild vaginal discharge
No pelvic pain
Good appetite
Weight stable

Examination:
PS 0
Abdomen soft, non-tender
No lymphadenopathy

Plan:
Routine MRI pelvis in 3 months
Follow up appointment in clinic in 3 months with scan result
Provided contact details for clinical nurse specialist
To continue with vaginal dilators as advised by specialist nurse?

status_updates.value: Stage IIA2 cervical cancer. First review following completion of radical chemoradiotherapy with good tolerance and currently stable
Follow up appointment in clinic in 3 months with scan result
